dashboard.amountToTreasury: The amount of SNGLS needed to be paid to the treasury
dashboard.toAddToProtocol: to add content to the protocol.
dashboard.transFeeDescription: The % of the transaction that the protocol puts into the treasury.

daojoin.needStake: You need to stake tokens to become a member of the DAO
daojoin.haveAmountStaked: The amount you have staked will be your reputation in the DAO

membership.amountNeedToStake: The amount of SNGLS needed to stake in the DAO so you don't have to pay the transaction fee.
membership.name: Name

tooltips.useSchemaToRewardUsers: Use this scheme to reward users (rep and/or funds) for their contributions to the DAO
tooltips.useToInstallEditRemove: Use this scheme to install, remove or edit the schemes of the DAO
tooltips.boostedProposalPassed: Boosted proposals are passed or failed via relative majority over a configured voting period
tooltips.pendingBoosted: Pending boosting proposals have reached the prediction score required for boosting and now must make it through the pending period without dipping below that threshold in order to be boosted.
tooltips.smallAmountEthIsNecessary: A small amount of ETH is necessary to submit a proposal in order to pay gas costs
tooltips.learnAboutSchemaProtParams: Learn about the protocol parameters for this scheme
tooltips.hasNotYetRedeemed: Proposal has not yet been redeemed
tooltips.uHaveAlreadyVotedMaximumNumberOfTime: You have already voted the maximum number of times
tooltips.onlyAdminUser: Only the "admin" user is allowed to create submissions
tooltips.competitionProposalHasNotBeenApproved: The competition proposal has not been approved
tooltips.theTitleIsTHeHeaderOfTheProposal: The title is the header of the proposal card and will be the first visible information about your proposal
tooltips.addSomeTags: Add some tags to give context about your proposal e.g. idea, signal, bounty, research, etc
tooltips.linkToTheFullyDetailedDesc: Link to the fully detailed description of your proposal
tooltips.anticipatedNumber: The anticipated number of winning Submissions for this competition
tooltips.percentageDistribution: Percentage distribution of rewards to beneficiaries
tooltips.numberOfSubmissions: Number of Submissions for which each member can vote
tooltips.youAreTheOnlyAccAbleCreateSubmissions: You are the only account that will be able to create submissions
tooltips.onceTheProposalSubmitted: Once the proposal is submitted it cannot be edited or deleted
tooltips.percentageOfVoting: Percentage of voting power currently voting for and against
tooltips.genTokenStaked: GEN tokens staked to predict the proposal will pass or fail
tooltips.etherAddressOrAlchemyUserToReceiveReward: Ethereum Address or Alchemy Username to receive rewards
tooltips.listOfEntities: List of entities (DAOs and individuals) that have voting power in the DAO
tooltips.spaceDesignated: Space designated for general questions, statements and comments
tooltips.regProposalArePassedOrFailed: Regular proposals are passed or failed via absolute majority over a configured voting period. If enough GEN is staked predicting they will pass, they can move to the pending and then boosted queues.

account.inOrderToEvoke: In order to evoke a sense of trust and reduce risk of scams, we invite you to create a user profile which will be associated with your current Ethereum address.
account.name: Name:
account.proveIt: Prove it's you by linking your social accounts through 3box.

notifications.confirm: Often transactions get approved after 24h, closing this will prevent you from following the status of the tx, are you sure you would like to close this?
notifications.transactionSent: transaction sent! Please wait for it to be processed
notifications.sendingRedeem: Sending redeem transaction, please wait for it to be mined

youWantToLeave: Are you sure you want to leave?

errPages.mess: This URL seems wrong (probably a copy-paste error üòâ)‚Ä¶ Please check the url or contact support.

shared.whenUVoteRegProposal: When you vote on a regular proposal, 1% of your reputation is taken away for the duration of the vote. You will get the 1% back + an extra reputation reward if you vote correctly (e.g. vote For on a proposal that passes or vote Against on a proposal that fails). If you vote on a regular proposal that times-out, you will get your reputation back.
shared.ifUVoteForAndPasses: If you vote For and the proposal passes you will be given a portion of whatever GEN have been staked on the proposal.
shared.ifUVoteAgainstAndPasses: If you vote Against and the proposal fails you will be given a portion of whatever GEN have been staked on the proposal.
shared.notReceivedOnBoosted: You will not receive reputation or GEN for voting on a boosted proposal.
shared.whenYouPredictCorrectly: When you predict correctly you gain (1) GEN from the DAO bounty. (2) A portion of GEN from incorrect predictions.
shared.uReceiveRep: When you predict correctly, you receive some reputation from other voters who didn't vote correctly on the proposal.
shared.whenIncorrect: When you predict incorrectly you simply lose all the GEN you have staked.
shared.notHaveEnoughtGen: You do not have enough GEN
shared.toSavePersData: We're using 3Box to save your personal data
shared.needToSignTwoMessage: You'll need you to sign two messages to allow us to save the data in your 3Box account. Expect to wait several seconds between each signature. Afterwards you won't need to sign more messages during this session.
shared.pleasLogIn: Please log in to see your rewards.
shared.getMoreRewards: Get more rewards by proposing a proposal that the DAO accepts, and by voting / staking in alignment with the DAO.

schema.firstOneToCreate: You can be the first one to create a {{schemeFriendlyName}} proposal today! :)
schema.newBounties: New bounties can be created with a new bounty proposal.
schema.noOpenBounties: No Open Bounties At This Time

schema.genProtForPlugRemoval: Genesis Protocol Params for Plugin Removal -
schema.sendingTransaction: Sending the transaction to the payment service -- please be patient
schema.errorOcuredTransaction: An error occurred on the transaction service:

schema.afterRedemptionRepIsNotTransfered: ‚ö†Ô∏è After redemption, reputation is not transferable
schema.tryNewExperimentalFeature: Or try our new experimental feature:
schema.noneOfCompSubmissionReceivedAnyVotes: None of the competition submissions received any votes. Competition rewards will be returned to the DAO.
schema.thisCompetitionREceivedNoSobmissions: This competition received no submissions. Competition rewards will be returned to the DAO.
schema.whatAreYouPropToDo: What are you proposing to do?
schema.howMuchWillItCost: How much will it cost the DAO?
schema.whenDoUPlanToDeliver: When do you plan to deliver the work?
schema.canDistributeFunds: This competition proposal can distribute funds, mint new DAO tokens, or assign Reputation. Additionally, you may determine how many winners are rewarded, as well as their proportional distribution. Each proposal may specify one of each action, e.g. "3 ETH and 100 Reputation in total rewards, 3 total winners, 50/25/25% reward distribution".
schema.numOfVotesPerRepHolder: Number of votes per reputation holder
schema.canOnlyBeCreatedByYou: Submissions can only be created by you

proposal.forStaking: For staking on the proposal you are due to receive:
proposal.asBeneficiary: As the beneficiary of the proposal you are due to receive:
proposal.benificiary: The beneficiary of the proposal is due to receive:
proposal.forVoting: For voting on the proposal you are due to receive:
proposal.dueToReceive: For creating the proposal you are due to receive:
proposal.cannotBeRedeemed: At this time, none of these rewards can be redeemed -- {{name}} does not hold all the necessary assets.
proposal.someOfThisCanBeRedeemed: At this time, only some of these rewards can be redeemed -- {{dao.name}} does not hold all the necessary assets.
proposal.inOrderToActivate: In order to activate predictions, you must authorize our smart contract to receive GENs from you. Upon activation, the smart contract will be authorized to receive up to 100000 GENs. This transaction will not cost you GEN or commit you in any way to spending your GENs in the future.
proposal.execThisProposal: Executing this proposal will mint a total of:
proposal.beforeVoting: Before voting on this proposal, verify that the passed IPFS hash is a valid certificate. Click on the hash below to see the certificate:
proposal.execThisPropWillCallTheFunc: Executing this proposal will call the function
proposal.itAllowsTheCo2ken: It allows the the CO2ken contract to move DAI held by the DAO. This way, the DAO can offset its emissions by calling:
proposal.itTransfersAll: It transfers all the DAI stored in the CO2ken contract to the DAO.
proposal.theValueDescribes: The value describes the amount of DAI (with 18 decimals) that are sent to the CO2ken contract to offset a relative amount of the DAO‚Äòs carbon emissions.
proposal.theValueDescribesTheAmountOfCarbon: The value describes the amount of carbon tons (with 18 decimals) the DAO wants to offset.
proposal.withTheNewOwner: with the new owner‚Äòs address being
proposal.draining: Draining {{decodedCallData}} amount of tokens for bounty ID {{decodedCallData}}.
proposal.acceptingSubmission: Accepting submission ID {{decodedCallData}} for bounty ID {{decodedCallData}} of {{decodedCallData}} tokens.
proposal.andSend: and send {{decodedCallData}} tokens for bounty ID {{decodedCallData}}.
proposal.pleaseSelectAtLeastSomeReward: Please select at least some reward
proposal.thisProposalCanSendEth: This proposal can send eth / erc20 token. Each proposal can have one of each of these actions. e.g. 20 SNGLS for completing a project + 0.05 ETH for covering expenses.
proposal.describeYourProposal: Describe your proposal in greater detail
proposal.exportableUrls: Exportable url is now in clipboard :)
proposal.proposeToAddNewApplication: Propose to add a new application to the DAO. If this application is a universal scheme, you must also supply its param hash configuration.
proposal.proposeToEditParamHash: Propose to edit param hash configuration of an application.
proposal.proposeToRemove: Propose to remove an application from the DAO.
